section.p: "An Act whose immediate and primary outcome (post-condition) is the alteration of the physical condition of the subject." - HL7 v3 This is equivalent to File 725 in VistA.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
Unique Identifier for the EventCapture for the Patient
